title: Unity Certified VR Developer
description: Advanced certification demonstrating expertise in VR development with Unity engine, including spatial audio, hand tracking, and performance optimization for Meta Quest and HTC Vive platforms.

title: Machine Learning Specialization
description: Comprehensive deep dive into supervised learning, neural networks, and deep learning architectures. Completed hands-on projects in computer vision and natural language processing.

title: Advanced QA & Test Automation
description: International certification covering test automation frameworks, CI/CD integration, and modern testing methodologies for agile development environments.

title: Meta Quest Developer Course
description: Specialized training in developing immersive VR experiences for Meta Quest platform, including hand tracking, passthrough AR, and social VR features.
